game.name: Toy Shop
game.description:
Welcome to the most popular toy shop of your city where you have been appointed as the toy designer! Would you not mind in accepting this challenge? Join Toy Shop and be prepared to design the best beautiful dolls for the three little girls who come to your shop today! The best part is that you would have plenty of items to choose to perform your task in the optimum possible way. It is not pretty exciting and challenging to become a master toymaker and make people look happy with your good work. 

Create and customize the dolls by making changes in their hairstyles, eyes, color and skin color in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! There are multiple designer clothes and accessories to choose from. You have to create a toy for Sujy, Emma and Erika in this girls game. Choose a nice red color frock, green color frock or a pink color gown! You can also dress her up with a top and matching jean. Complete the look of your doll with a matching pair of sandals, nice handbag, and sparkling jewelry items! 

Follow these steps while making each doll for your every girl in this one of the coolest fashion games for girls! Once you are done, click the next button and end result will be shown on the screen. The little girl will also appreciate your efforts with some kind words. Take their words as motivation and get ready to try out some cool decoration games for girls and boys that are playable on multiple devices, no download required! Hope you would have amazing toy designing and making experience in your free time!!
